mapper.insert: insert into post (post_id, title, status, products_price, hit_count, contents, created, deadLine, choose_file, post_like_count, recruitment, type, category_id, my_addr, user_id, like_date) values (#{postId}, #{title}, #{status}, #{productsPrice}, 0, #{contents}, current_timestamp, current_timestamp, #{chooseFile}, 0, #{recruitment}, #{type}, #{categoryId}, #{myAddr}, #{userId}, current_timestamp)
mapper.select:
select * from ( select rownum rnum, data.* from ( select post_id,title,status,products_price,hit_count, contents,to_char(created,'YYYY-MM-DD'),to_char(dead_line,'YYYY-MM-DD'), choose_file,post_like_count,recruitment,type, category_id,my_addr,user_id,to_char(like_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') from post order by post_id desc) data)
where rnum>=#{start} and rnum<=#{end}
mapper.update: update post set hit_count=hit_count+1 where post_id=#{postId}
